product_name: Kinetic Rock And Roll 2.0 Bike Trainer
long_description: The Kinetic Rock And Roll 2.0 Bike Trainer offers quiet, fluid-based progressive resistance with a unique feature--a pivot that replicates side-to-side motion to help improve technique.
short_description: The Kinetic Rock And Roll 2.0 Bike Trainer offers quiet, fluid-based progressive resistance with a unique feature--a pivot that replicates side-to-side motion to help improve technique.
